item.description: <p>South Australian MP Nick McBride was originally charged with three aggravated counts of assaulting his wife, Katherine, on April 10 at Conmurra, on the Limestone Coast.</p>

item.title: Teen charged after two stabbed in afternoon brawl at Melbourne train station
item.description: <p>Detectives found a screwdriver at the crime scene, which they will allege was used to assault one of the victims.﻿</p>

item.title: Arrest made, man left in serious condition after 'random' Sydney stabbing attack
item.description: <p>T﻿he 51-year-old victim is in serious condition in hospital after he sustained wounds to his arms, face and hand.</p>

item.title: Major Sydney university reveals personal data including bank account details and legal information exposed in
item.description: <p>The personal data of past and present students was exposed in two data breaches this year.</p>

item.title: Mercury soars to blistering temperatures as hot air mass suffocates parts of Queensland
item.description: <p>A suffocating hot mass is encompassing large parts of Queensland, sparking extreme heatwave and fire danger alerts. ﻿</p>

item.title: 'Whole-of-community response' needed to prevent escalating youth knife crime, coroner says
item.description: <p>Five years after a 15-year-old died in a&quot;senseless&quot; fatal stabbing, a Victorian coroner has used her finding into his death to plead for a stop to escalating youth violence.</p>

item.title: Man caught hiding in stormwater drain to evade arrest in NSW
item.description: <p>T﻿he 21-year-old was found using a drain inspection camera.</p>

item.title: Public asked to help to find missing WA mum who vanished a week ago
item.description: <p>Michelle Joan Leahy vanished after travelling to the Perth suburb of Nedlands for a medical appointment on the afternoon of Thursday, October 16 about 3.15pm.</p>

item.title: Woman texted friend about 'absolute hell' before alleged murder
item.description: <p>Before being allegedly murdered by her ex-partner, Tatiana Dokhotaru confided he had threatened to kill her during a fight in which he allegedly dragged her by the hair and spat on her repeatedly.</p>

item.title: FedEx releases cut off dates for sending deliveries ahead of Christmas
item.description: <p>FedEx is encouraging Australias to plan ahead to ensure their Christmas parcels arrive on time.</p>

item.title: Two Optus executives to exit the company after triple-zero disaster
item.description: <p>The telco announced this afternoon that chief financial officer and board member Michael Venter and chief information officer Mark Potter will leave the business early next year.</p>

item.title: Motorcyclist dies on his way to work after colliding with a ute in Sydney's south-west
item.description: <p>T﻿he victim was identified as 23-year-old Ahmed Akhtar, a civil engineering student who was on his way to work.</p>

item.title: Man rescued after falling from cliff near Victorian tourism hotspot
item.description: <p>Emergency services were called to the Great Ocean Road in Princetown following reports a man had fallen 10 metres and landed on a cliff edge below. </p>

item.title: Man stabbed to death in unit block on the Gold Coast
item.description: <p>A man in his 50s has died after being stabbed multiple times in a unit block on the Gold Coast﻿.</p>

item.title: Aussies queued for hours to get in on the gold rush. Right after, the price plummeted
item.description: <p>In recent weeks, people have been lining up for hours in Sydney with one goal in mind: buying some gold. But things haven&#x27;t gone to plan.</p>

item.title: Aussies may be incorrectly blaming gut issues on gluten intolerance, researchers find
item.description: <p>Australians who&#x27;ve self-diagnosed a gluten intolerance have been warned that they&#x27;re likely cutting out the wrong foods.</p>
